version_description:
NEW LEVELS, and 20 more each week!

Taking the perilous path through a gorge full of giant gobstoppers, Candice ascends into the heavens to discover a city in the cotton-candy clouds…

– 20 new levels in Gobstopper Gorge!
– Plus 20 more to come in Candy Cloud City!
– 1,950 levels today, 1,970 next week!
– Update now for NEW LEVELS, and 20 MORE EACH WEEK!

NEW LEVELS, and 20 more each week!

There's a chill in the air as Candice explores a glistening frosted palace. Treading carefully through the icy valley beyond, she is cheered by the sight of merry mallow snowmen…

– 20 new levels in Winter Icing Palace!
– Plus 20 more to come in Mallow Snowman Valley!
– 2,030 levels today, 2,050 next week!
– Update now for NEW LEVELS, and 20 MORE EACH WEEK!

Candice's adventure continues through the winding Marble Cake Mesa, before she dives head first into a deep gorge of frosting!

- 20 New levels in Marble Cake Mesa
- Then 20 more in the Frosting Fjord
- This brings the total levels up to a whopping 2150

NEW LEVELS, and 20 more each week!

Candice pays a visit to the home of her fairy friends before adventuring through a foreboding thicket.

- 20 New levels in Fairy Forest
- Then 20 more in the Brittle Bracken Briars
- This brings the total levels up to a whopping 2190

NEW LEVELS, and 20 more each week!
Setting sail, Candice makes a voyage on a towering tall ship. Landing at a romantic lake with water fountains, she rediscovers her love… of sweets.

– 20 new levels in Bonbon Voyage!
– Plus 20 more to come in Love Heart Lake!
– 2,210 levels today, 2,230 next week!
– Update now for NEW LEVELS, and 20 MORE EACH WEEK!

NEW LEVELS, and 20 more each week!
All aboard! Candice and Cookie ride a steam train overflowing with delicious sweet treats. Then while diving into the depths of a minty fresh ocean they uncover an ancient sunken city.

– 20 new levels onboard the Candy Train!
– Plus 20 more to come at the Sunken Spearmint Shrine!
– Update now for NEW LEVELS, and 20 MORE EACH WEEK!

NEW LEVELS, and 20 more each week!
All aboard! Candice and Cookie ride a steam train overflowing with delicious sweet treats. Then while diving into the depths of a minty fresh ocean they uncover an ancient sunken city.

– 20 new levels onboard the Candy Train!
– Plus 20 more to come at the Sunken Spearmint Shrine!
– Update now for NEW LEVELS, and 20 MORE EACH WEEK!

Candice scales the high walls of an ancient Candy castle to gaze down upon a tasty mushroom town.

- Play across 2 new areas! Candy Citadel & Mushroom Town!
- That’s a 40 NEW LEVELS! 20  levels released today than 20 more next week!
- Update now for a SWEET new adventure!

NEW LEVELS, and 20 more each week!
Candice and Cookie visit a town just popping with fun before they stumble upon an enchanted glade that glows with gummy magic!

– 20 new levels in Fizzy Town
– Plus 20 more to come in Glowing Gummy Glade
– 2,330 levels today, 2,350 next week!
– Update now for NEW LEVELS, and 20 MORE EACH WEEK!

Candice scales the high walls of an ancient Candy castle to gaze down upon a tasty mushroom town.

- Play across 2 new areas! Candy Citadel & Mushroom Town!
- That’s a 40 NEW LEVELS! 20  levels released today than 20 more next week!
- Update now for a SWEET new adventure!

NEW LEVELS, and 20 more each week!

Sugary shortbread ruins greet Candice as she wends her way past chocolate-dipped, biscuity bricks. Sweet and sticky bubblegum fountains then await, in luscious gardens full of colorful confection.

- 20 new levels in Munchu Picchu!
- Plus 20 more to come in the Hanging Gardens of Bubblegum!
- 2,410 levels today, 2,430 next week!
- Update now for NEW LEVELS, and 20 MORE EACH WEEK!

Crafty Candy's got a sweet new look! Now it's even easier to follow the fun!

Swirling towers of cream-filled scrumptious sponge come into view as Candice travels through the Red Velvet relics. A bountiful harvest of succulent, sugar-coated strawberries then appears in a fruity fairyland.

- 20 new levels in the Red Velvet Ruins!
- Plus 20 more to come in Strawberry Fields!
- 2,450 levels today, 2,470 next week!

The fun doesn’t stop with a NEW event & levels!

Introducing the Win Streak, pass levels and unlock boosters! The adventure continues when Candice stops for a quick refreshing drink at Cranberry Creek before exploring the shimmering Sherbet Shores!

- Pass levels without losing a life to start levels with boosters in the NEW Win Streak event
- 20 new levels in Cranberry Creek
- Plus 20 more to come in Sherbet Shores

New Levels, and 20 more each week!

Candice wanders down an enchanted alley, trying all the fantastic sweets it has to offer! Then it’s onto a lost cavern filled with delicious ice cream of every flavor!

• 20 new levels in Gummy Dragon Alley!
• Plus 20 more to come in the Gelato Grotto
• That’s a total of 2530 levels now & 2550 levels next week!

Update now for NEW LEVELS, and 20 MORE EACH WEEK!

It’s a sweet new update!
Earn amazing rewards for just playing with exciting weekly events! A zesty paradise welcomes Candice before she continues her journey through the delicious Fondant Falls! Update now for 40 NEW levels, 20 now and more 20 next week!

It’s a sweet new update!
Earn amazing rewards for just playing with exciting weekly events! A zesty paradise welcomes Candice before she continues her journey through the delicious Fondant Falls! Update now for 40 NEW levels, 20 now and 20 more next week!

Time to work your magic!
Explore the whimsical Witch Hat Hamlet, before relaxing in a fruity glade at Panna Cottage! But that’s not all, take on the Tricky Trail and earn SWEET rewards! Update now for 40 NEW levels, 20 now and more 20 next week!

Stumble upon the legendary Sword in the Scone, a weapon that belonged to the first Candy King in 20 spellbinding new levels! Then next week, travel the Dessert Dunes in another 20 levels overflowing with Candy.
If that’s not enough, claim sweet rewards in our weekly events! Update now for 40 NEW levels! 20 now and 20 next week!

Sweet New Levels!

Scramble across a golden horde of the Treacle Treasury in 20 exciting new levels! Then, it’s time to head to the Penny Candy Park for another magical adventure in 20 levels coming next! Update now for exclusive levels and claim your PRIZES in the Delicious Deliveries in exclusive events!

Craft Some Magic!

We have revamped our crafting system! Collect potions, mix up the magic and craft powerful Spells to help you on your Crafty adventure. There has never been so much magic at your fingertips!

Speaking of adventure… Continue yours through the Gumball Geysers in 20 explosive new levels! Then next week, travel to the delicious Smoothie Lagoon just dripping with flavor. Enter our weekly events and claim sweet rewards! Update today for the all NEW crafting system!

Ready for a sweet NEW UPDATE?!

Your magical adventure takes you through the deliciously delightful Rainbow Cake Castle before you explore the tasty town of Saint Battenberg. But the adventure doesn’t end there, it’s time to team up with other candy witches and earn AMAZING rewards! Update today for 40 NEW LEVELS and an exciting NEW event! Update today for a total of 2970 fun-filled levels!

It's the Spooky Spirit Special!
We're celebrating Halloween with a whole month of events! Join the fun for NEW & EXCLUSIVE events, rewards, and dresses!
But that’s not all! ! Your adventure continues in 20 new levels at Millionaires’ Mansion before exploring the delicious delights of Pandan Palace in another 20 sweet levels!
UPDATE TODAY for Halloween events, new rewards and 40 sweet levels!

A Tasty Fall Update!

It’s the perfect season to settle down with a sweet new update! Get comfortable with a warm cocoa in the Hot Chocolate Hollow with 20 NEW levels, then roll up to the maple taffy ranch at the Sugar Bush for ANOTHER 20 thrilling levels!

Candice and friends keep the fun going with DELICIOUS events and rewards to keep you on your toes! Update now to join them!

Update today and spread the love!

Join our Pride events and celebrate with sweet Rainbow Candy rewards! But that’s not all! Explore the lost Candy Cap Forest in 40 exciting NEW levels!

Update today for all this fun and more!

A Tasty Fall Update!

It’s the perfect season to settle down with a sweet new update! Get comfortable with a warm cocoa in the Hot Chocolate Hollow with 20 NEW levels, then roll up to the maple taffy ranch at the Sugar Bush for ANOTHER 20 thrilling levels!

Candice and friends keep the fun going with DELICIOUS events and rewards to keep you on your toes! Update now to join them!

Join the Winter Wonderland!

The festivities in Crafty Candy continue with exclusive dresses & rewards.

December 20th: Join a team, match candies & unlock a SWEET NEW look in the Cauldron Club

December 27th: Get ready to celebrate the New Year with Delicious Deliveries

But that’s not all! We have a HUGE double update! Travel to the delicious land of Cake Pop Copse before, heading to the sugary Yule Log Cabin in 40 sweet NEW levels! Then in part 2 of the DOUBLE UPDATE, head to the Crispyrock Caverns & Sour Sweet Swamp in another 40 NEW levels! Update today for exciting events & EXCLUSIVE rewards!

A New Year, A New Update

It’s time to head to the Green Mint Glaciers and explore 20 NEW levels, so cool they are ice cold. Then it’s onto the Haunted Barrows of Bundt where 20 exciting levels await! UPDATE TODAY for exclusive events, amazing rewards and 40 all NEW levels!

Celebrate Chinese New Year!

Join the fun and jump into the Chinese New Year with exciting events and exclusive rewards!

But that’s not all! Explore the gooey peaks of Crumbling Caldera in 20 NEW levels and then onto the sweet deliciousness of the Vanilla Bean Valley in another 20 NEW levels!

Update today for a total of 40 NEW levels and a Chinese New Year you are sure to remember!

Sweet Treats Await!

It’s time to update Crafty Candy and set out on a new sugar filled adventure! Update now for 20 NEW levels in the Cocoa Cabana then 20 more unlock next week in the Matchamist Moors! Collect Gummy Paws and enjoy Delicious Deliveries for amazing rewards!

Download now for the sweetest update yet!

St. Patricks Spectacular!

Jump into an exciting new update, filled with events! You won’t need luck this St.Patricks day when you build your Win Streak and unlock powerful boosts! Then it’s time to collect gummies in the Springtime Special!

Join Candice through the 20 NEW levels of Winterlight Woods then hike through the Neapolitan Pass in another 20 levels!

Join the Flower Festival!

Celebrate the Flower Festival in Crafty Candy, filled with exclusive dresses & rewards.

April 11th: Kick things off with something sweet in Delicious Deliveries.
April 18th: Join a team, match candies & unlock a look in the Cauldron Club.

But that’s not all! Travel down the Lemon Brick Road in 20 NEW levels before heading to the Jam Tart Gardens in 20 MORE!

Update today for exciting events & rewards!

Join the Flower Festival!

Celebrate the Flower Festival in Crafty Candy, filled with exclusive dresses & rewards.

April 11th: Kick things off with something sweet in Delicious Deliveries.
April 18th: Join a team, match candies & unlock a look in the Cauldron Club.

But that’s not all! Travel down the Creme Canals in 20 NEW levels before climbing the Lollipop Lighthouse in 20 MORE!

Update today for exciting events & rewards!

Last Chance to Join the  Flower Festival!

The Crafty Candy Flower Festival is in full swing! Join now for the exclusive Cauldron Club event and earn amazing spring dresses and much more! But that’s not all! Explore the lost Temples of Tiramisu and visit the peaceful Wafer Way in 40 NEW levels!

Update today for exciting events & EXCLUSIVE rewards!

Join the Fun!

Jump into an exciting new update, filled with events! Build your Win Streak and unlock powerful boosts! Then collect Gummy Flowers in our Spring Special!

Adventure through the 20 NEW levels of Custard Cove then explore the Baklava Fountains in another 20 levels!

Update today for another adventure!

A Sweet New Adventure Awaits!

Celebrate Spring with a sweet sale & build your Win Streak for tasty rewards! How many levels will you complete?

Then, take a stroll through Turnover Terrace in 20 deliciously puzzling NEW levels! Then onto the lost Jaffa Jungle in another 20 levels next week!

Update today for another adventure!

Update today and spread the love!

Join our Pride events and celebrate with sweet Rainbow Candy rewards! But that’s not all! Explore the lost Candy Cap Forest in 40 exciting NEW levels!

Update today for all this fun and more!

It’s a Fireworks Frenzy!

The Fireworks Frenzy MEGA event returns with new dresses, events, surprise and much more! But that’s not all, play through 40 new levels in Mallowfluff Mire, 20 now then 20 more next week!

This update can’t be missed! Download Now!

A sweet new update is ready to play!

Introducing new Hard Stick Candy! Can you concoct your way around this tricky obstacle? But that’s not all! Explore the ancient Shortcake Stones in 40 enchanting NEW levels!

Update today for all this fun and more!

A Sweet New Update!

Update today to take part in SWEET events and unlock tasty rewards! Start off by building your Win Streak to see how many levels you pass, then group up and compete in the Cauldron Club multiplayer event! But that’s not all, play through 40 new levels in Shortbread Henge, 20 now then 20 more next week!

This update can’t be missed! Download Now!

Delicious New Levels!

The rewards have never been sweeter with our amazing events! Starting today join the Win Streak to get rewards for every level passed! Then work with others in the Cauldron Club!

Your adventure continues as Candice makes her way through the Sugar Web Woods in 20 new levels. Unlock your Chi in another set of levels at the Dragon Fruit Dojo, coming next week!

Update now for all this and more!

A Tasty New Update!

Don't look down as you race over the floating Isles of Mint in 20 DELICIOUS new levels! Then, if you go down to the woods today, you're sure to find 20 MORE levels waiting for you at the Cupcake Camp!

Take part in amazing events and win magical rewards - Raise that win streak to fly through levels in Delicious Deliveries, then work with other Candy Witches in the Cauldron Club!

Don't miss out! Update Now!

A Tasty New Update!

Don't look down as you race over the floating Isles of Mint in 20 DELICIOUS new levels! Then, if you go down to the woods today, you're sure to find 20 MORE levels waiting for you at the Cupcake Camp!

Take part in amazing events and win magical rewards - Raise that win streak to fly through levels in Delicious Deliveries, then work with other Candy Witches in the Cauldron Club!

Don't miss out! Update Now!

Sweet Treats Await!

It’s time to update Crafty Candy and set out on a new sugar-filled adventure! Update now for 20 NEW levels in the Cupcake Camp, then 20 more unlock next week in the Jam Tart Gardens!

Join the amazing events and claim rewards that are oh so sweet! Build your Win Streak and take on more levels, then collect Gummy Paws and unlock prizes!

Download now for the sweetest update yet!

Sweet Treats Await!

It’s time to update Crafty Candy and set out on a new sugar-filled adventure! Update now for 20 NEW levels in the Cupcake Camp, then 20 more unlock next week in the Jam Tart Gardens!

Join the amazing events and claim rewards that are oh so sweet! Build your Win Streak and take on more levels, then collect Gummy Paws and unlock prizes!

Download now for the sweetest update yet!

Join the Winter Wonderland!
Winter Wonderlands starts December 16th! Events, sales, exclusive Looks, plus much more! Check the in-game calendar for details!

But that’s not all! We have a HUGE double update! Travel to the delicious land of Custard Cove in 40 sweet NEW levels! Then head to the Snow Candy Cap Woods in ANOTHER 40 new levels!

Update today for exciting events, exclusive rewards & 80 new levels!

A New Year A Sweet New Update!

Join Candice and Cookie on a magical adventure! Build your Win Streak and unlock powerful boosts! Then collect Rainbow Candies for awesome rewards!

Watch out for Trixie, she might have something naughty planned for the new levels!

Update today for another adventure!

Join the Candy Cup!

Warm up your wands, practice your spells and compete in the New Event! Play against other players and get to the top of the leaderboard; match candies and beat levels to earn trophies to climb the ranks!

Magical rewards await anyone who can get to the top and be the best! Show off your crafting skills!

Play Now!

A delicious new update is ready, filled with:

- New levels
- New ways to sign in
- Bug Fixes

Update now!
